TopicTitle: What do you want to see in 0.24

Articles.Content: What I don't want is a "What do you want to see in 0.24" thread before 0.23 is released.
I don't see this thread lasting long..

Like always...

Resources...

Structures like the VAB and the launch platform with their functions to be able to be built in orbit and on other planets...

What I actually expect...

Career mode missions and monetary system.
What I don't want is a "What do you want to see in 0.25" thread before 0.24 is released.

If we see ice asteroids in the Trojan's of the Jool Orbit in .23 then I want to be able to extract hydrogen and oxygen from them in .24. We should also have the option to fuel LV-N's with straight H2 with an appropriate increase in ISP to 1100 and an appropriate decrease in thrust - also the option to fuel the LV-N with water at an ISP of 600 but higher thrust.

Oh and fix the LV-N's to run on just oxidizer or fuel, and jet fuel

Whatever the devs implement.

It'll be a sad day when someone is talking about 0.26 before 0.23 is released...

Whatever the devs implement.

It'll be a sad day when someone is talking about 0.26 before 0.23 is released...

I don't care about 0.24, in 0.26 I want a giant planet the size of 9001 jools that's in the shape of a billboard saying #YOLO

(Not really, I want 2)
This thread is bad and you should feel bad.
I believe this thread will be locked...

RanZ you would be correct on that. Come on guys, .22 like, just came out, and .23 is the next one, we're still not 100% sure what'll be in that update until it's out. Until .23 is released, maybe then we'll have a bit of speculation on .24, until then, let's calm down a bit.

-M5K
